1.content:
vanilla: play the interactive without mods and without ant memory and with a regular map generation.

mod: choose any mod you can think of to play the game with

map: choose a custom map to play the interactive with

texture pack: choose an appearance or theme for your world

skin: choose how you apear
1.title: launcher

11.content:
single player survival: play in the world and try to survive, if you die you can re spawn

single player hardcore: play and try to survive but if you die that's it

single player creative: be immortal and all powerful and simply create

multi player survival: same as regular survival but you may find other players in the world

other multi player: other form of multi player
11.title: vanilla

111.content: So you spawned in your normal world and looked around, you were in a plains biome with a forest nearby.
111.title: Spawning

112.content:
Completely clueless: Steve has no idea about anything

Seen it before: he died and woke up in this world

More choices: not what you want? make more options!
112.title: more choices yay!!!

1123.content:
player controlled: experience the interactive as though you were simply playing minecraft

innate knowledge: Steve knows all he needs not from experience but from

other: speaks for itself
1123.title: More choices

11231.content:
OK it's totally player controlled there will always be an other choice in case you have a better idea and it's first person.

you are standing on a beach, over the sea no other land is clearly visible, facing inland you are immidiatly facing a dense forest of oak and birch trees, the sun is risen and the sky is blue, nothing else is visible and your pockets are empty.
11231.title: dawn day one

choices: Large: More than twenty players b
114.content:
What sized sever are you playing on?

(A note: these sizes just refer to the number of plates online during the story, not how many players can access the server!)
114.title: multi player survival

choices: Not at all: Steve goes in knowing nothing about the world.
Just a little: Steve has an inherent understanding of the game mechanics only.
All of it: Steve is an old hand at this stuff.
1141.content: How much knowledge does Steve have?
1141.title: Small: Less than five players.

11412.content:
Right, so this means Steve already knows how the crafting system works and how to go about gathering and fighting and all that nonsense, but otherwise knows nothing about the landscape he finds himself in. If that's not what you want, remember that you can always hit 'go back!'

One last thing, do you want to wake up near the other players, or farther away?
11412.title: Just a little: Steve has an inherent understand...

114121.content:
You and three others wake up just as the sun rises over the horizon. None of you know how you've gotten here, but you doubt you're going to be able to find a way home anytime soon. You are on a sandy beach at the edge of a dense forest that smells strongly of leaves. Ahead you can see mostly oak tress, and beyond them a snow-capped mountain range is just barely visible.

What do you do?
114121.title: Near by!

choices: Hexxit (includes castles, domes, battle towers and pirate ships)
Mo Creatures (More mobs both hostile and friendly with appear in the world)
Galaticraft (Have the ability to explore space)
12.content: you decide that this game need more than just the stuff included in the vanilla campaign. Which mod do you want to implement into the game?
12.title: mod

15.content: Now you have to choose your skin. You can be Steve, Alex, or other.
15.title: skin

151.content: You chose to be the normal default skin. So, do you want anything else changed in the launcher?
151.title: Launcher

info.brief_description: an interactive minecraft based story (including mods)
info.description: minecraft has always been limited because it needs a computer to run it but by putting it in an interactive story form it is running on the most powerful processor known to man the human brain.
